mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member (id, password, email, nickName, name) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{name})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(nickName) FROM Member WHERE nickName = #{nickName}
SELECT id, password, email, nickName, name, inserted FROM Member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, password, name, email, nickName, inserted FROM Member ORDER BY inserted DESC
